dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: Chris Beasley [mailto:chris@thebeasleys.org] 
Sent: Saturday, March 31, 2007 10:33 PM
To: DMCA Houston
Subject: Copyright Infringement

 

I am sending you a courtesy email noting that I sent you a proper DMCA
notification via fax just now.

 

This site hosted on your servers:

 

http://www.poetryconnection.net/poets/William_Shakespeare

 

Has republished without permission our author biography found here:

 

http://www.online-literature.com/shakespeare/

 

Thank you,

Chris Beasley

Jalic Inc
